items.name: The Green Swell Surf Academy
items.short_description: Learn to ride Nosara's iconic waves with an eco-conscious approach, offering lessons for all levels and focusing on ocean preservation. Experience sustainable surfing at its best, opened in 2022.
items.address: Playa Guiones, Sector K, Nosara, Guanacaste

items.name: Nectar Wellness Sanctuary
items.short_description: A serene retreat opened in 2023, offering holistic wellness programs including yoga, meditation, sound healing, and nourishing plant-based cuisine designed for deep relaxation and rejuvenation.
items.address: Road to Playa Pelada, Nosara, Guanacaste

items.name: Tierra Viva Eatery
items.short_description: Opened in 2021, this farm-to-table restaurant celebrates the freshest flavors of Costa Rica, sourcing ingredients directly from local Nosara farms to create vibrant, seasonal dishes.
items.address: Main Road, Near Super Nosara, Nosara, Guanacaste

items.name: Nosara Artisanal Collective
items.short_description: Discover the vibrant artistic spirit of Nosara at this gallery and workshop space, opened in 2022. It showcases local and international artists, with hands-on classes available for all ages.

items.name: Canopy & River Explorer
items.short_description: Experience Nosara's natural beauty with thrilling guided ATV tours, river kayaking adventures, and exhilarating zip-lining excursions through lush jungle canopies. Launched in 2020.

items.name: Luna Glamp Retreat
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in nature with luxury glamping tents and eco-chic bungalows, offering a unique blend of wilderness adventure and sophisticated comfort. Opened its doors in 2023.
items.address: Remote Road, North of Playa Pelada, Nosara, Guanacaste

items.name: Guardians of Nosara Wildlife Center
items.short_description: A dedicated rescue and rehabilitation center for local wildlife, opened in 2024. Offers educational tours to learn about Costa Rica's biodiversity and vital conservation efforts.
items.address: On the way to Playa Garza, Nosara, Guanacaste

items.name: Nosara Verde Market
items.short_description: A vibrant open-air market opened in 2022, dedicated to sustainable living, featuring organic produce, local crafts, artisan foods, and community events every weekend.
items.address: Next to Delicias del Mundo, Playa Guiones, Nosara

items.name: Sunset Sands Lounge
items.short_description: Opened in 2023, unwind with craft cocktails and delicious light bites at this chic beachfront lounge. It offers unparalleled views of Nosara's famous sunsets and a relaxed atmosphere.
items.address: Playa Guiones North, beachfront, Nosara, Guanacaste

items.name: The Little Explorer's Jungle Gym
items.short_description: A nature-inspired indoor and outdoor play space for children, designed to encourage imaginative play and physical activity in a safe and engaging environment. Opened its gates in 2024.
items.address: Behind the Mini Super, Nosara Town, Nosara, Guanacaste
